casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Terance Germaine MALACHI 142PA17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 1, 2017 Aaron Thomas Johnson, Assistant Appellate Defender, Constance E. Widenhouse, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Malachi, Terance Germaine. John R. Green, Jr., Special Deputy Attorney General, Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 30th of November 2017 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of December 2017."

*144State of NC shall have up to and including the 19th day of December 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
